ComicInfo.Summary:
KICK-ASS IS BACK. Patience is sucked deeper into the criminal underworld. Faced with a new horde of enemies, she must fight to keep her superhero activity and her identity safe. But what happens when the bad guys work out who's wearing the mask? The violence cuts way too close to home in the latest installment of MARK MILLAR and JOHN ROMITA JR.'s incredible KICK-ASS series, with a connecting HIT-GIRL #5 cover from ÖZGÜR YILDIRIM.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------|-------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | John Romita Jr. & Peter Steigerwald | 1 | | B | Black & White Variant Cover B | John Romita Jr. | 2 | | C | Variant Cover C | Ozgur Yildirim | 3 |
